struct VSOutput {
	float4 Position : SV_POSITION;
    float4 TexCoord : TEXCOORD;
};

VSOutput main(float4 Position : POSITION)
{
	VSOutput result;

    float4 p = float4(Position.x*9, Position.y*9, Position.z*9, 1.0);
    float4x4 m = mvp;
